entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hang with `HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering = false` in .NET 9 #113398
  • [API Proposal]: Allow me to bring my own HttpClient implementations #113395
  • JIT: pgostress hitting assert in vector division #113393
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow using `StringComparer` at `GetKeyedService` #113386
  • Deadlock under debugger #113373
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] No nightly stress runs for old versions #113372
    10.0.0
  • New "terminate called after throwing an instance of 'PAL_SEHException'" error with legacy EH enabled #113370
  • Exception in clrjit.dll when using .NET 9.0 #113369
  • Continued Issue with System.Memory 4.6.0 and NUnit in .NET Framework 4.7.2 #113368
  • With Faster Exceptions, exceptions thrown in some out-of-process COM calls raise AppDomain.CurrentDomain.UnhandledException #113367
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 3 Regressions on 3/8/2025 12:17:48 AM +00:00 #113378
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 5 Regressions on 3/6/2025 2:14:44 PM +00:00 #113379
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 3/3/2025 9:01:29 PM +00:00 #113380
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: System.IO.Tests.BinaryWriterTests Regression on 3/8/2025 7:47:21 PM +00:00 #113382
  • [API Proposal]: Type Mapping API #113362
    10.0.0
  • `Type.Equals(Type)` is not consistent with `Type.Equals(object)` when using modified types #113361
  • When type discriminator on a polymorphic type is also a property on the base type it is emitted twice into the resulting string #113358
  • LoongArch: LSX/LASX usage in CoreCLR #113354
  • MetadataLoadContext assembly binding behavior is documented incorrectly #113353
  • HashHelpers.FastMod could use Bmi2.X64.MultiplyNoFlags(ulong, ulong) directly #113352

Closed

  • Polymorphic types are failing to emit type discriminator field when serializing the derived type #113357
  • [Native AOT] Initialize COM eagerly #113040
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'use != nullptr' during 'Clone blocks with range checks' #113334
    10.0.0
  • Unknown socket error #64305
    10.0.0
  • Finish Avx512 specific lightup for Vector128/256/512<T> #85207
    10.0.0
  • Missing properties in Schema generated with GetJsonSchemaAsNode #113363
  • [API Proposal]: Add constructor to StreamReader and StreamWriter accepting ArrayPools #107490
    Future
  • Invalid .NET 10 MissingMethodException with specific SDK versions #113302
    10.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Security.Principal.Windows, Version=4.1.1.0 #113319
  • how to disable built in system.net http metrics #111697
  • coreclr + vsdbg failure to get stack trace from remote Kubernetes pod #101310
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Bad result on arm32 #113321
    10.0.0
  • JsonStringEnumConverter<T>(allowIntegerValues: true) generates JSON Schema with 'enum' list despite supporting all integer values #113269
  • JsonSerializerContext can't have mutliple dtos with the same name #113365
  • Deprecate or analyzer-warn HttpClient IsSuccessStatusCode and EnsureSuccessStatusCode #113177
  • Deadlock in asynchronous DNS resolution #112663
  • Test Failure: GC/Scenarios/muldimjagary/muldimjagary/muldimjagary.cmd. #113247
  • Add a link in the README back to corefx repo, for people looking for pre-5.0 code #41273
  • Crash in System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.GetStream #111650

PullRequests

Created

  • Added in non-generic interfaces for Tensors #113401
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • fix SBOM issues for runtime #113400
    area-Meta
  • Update Mac versions in helix queues #113399
    needs-area-label
  • Check if we have any IL tests using invalid metadata feature for layout #113397
    NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: avoid fp divide by zero in profile synthesis #113396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix OperExceptions for SIMD Divide #113394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix arm64 issue around flags and neg with contained operand #113391
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #113389
    linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #113388
    linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bump System.Text.Json toolset version #113385
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Bump System.Text.Json toolset version #113384
    needs-area-label
  • Fix blob and symbol package publishing #113377
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix assertions related to combining `cmn (extended-register)` (#113337) #113376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix obsoletion message for SslStream properties #113375
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [browser] Opt-out from using dotnet.boot.js #113374
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] 12-bit immediates in bit ops #113366
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Small TP improvement in assertprop #113360
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use await using in HttpContentJsonExtensions #113359
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Refactor `external_assembly_probe` to be separate from single-file bundle probing #113356
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Initialize COM before initializing FLS slot. #113194
    os-windows, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Correct Invariant Globalization docs #113392
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Don't update side-effects in a statement that doesn't exist #113351
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Accelerate Vector.Dot for all base types #111853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add another set of debugging prints for stack overflow issue #112284
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove `fgRelocateEHRegions` #113330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make sure FEATURE_STANDALONE_GC is defined for the usual VM build #113347
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Run switch peeling only once #113326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reword HostAbortedException docs #113336
    area-Extensions-Hosting, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112882
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.x
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 134.0.6998.35, windows: 134.0.6998.36 #113297
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Avoid dual "parameter" assignments #113324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [android][coreclr] Fix lifetime of host_runtime_contract in template #113341
    area-Build-mono
  • [manual] Merge release/9.0-staging into release/9.0 #113350
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #113349
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow

Updated

  • Add InlineArrayX types #113403
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference for tasks #113404
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement `ShuffleNative` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Switch to Azure Linux queues #112024
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Reduce size of x86 intrinsic jump table fallbacks #112556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [DRAFT] Stub Precode variant for DynamicHelpers #113402
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add the `CurrentUserOnly` and `CurrentSessionOnly` options for named `Mutex`, `Semaphore`, and `EventWaitHandle` #112213
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Allow limited recursive inlining #112318
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ThisptrRetbufPrecode to set of precodes handled by StubPrecode path #112548
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] vector intrinsics fixes #113288
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Separate code manager for the interpreter #112985
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Clear diagnostic headers on request reuse #113342
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Expand capability of CoreCLR Interpreter #113292
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [browser] profiler setup and env variables #113339
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Interpreter GC info stage 1: Use templates to specialize gc info encoder/decoder #113223
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Fix missing ServiceCallSite.Key causing an unkeyed cache entry to be overwritten by a keyed instance #113343
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix foreign exception handling on Windows #113323
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Remove `fgReorderBlocks` #113335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand local struct fields #113141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Switch simdhash to prime bucket counts; increase load factor #113274
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Support setting ACLs on file paths longer than `MAX_PATH` #109674
    area-System.IO, 8.0.x
  • arm64: Optimise GT/GE/LT/LE comparisons in return statements #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid all compiler optimization on embedded apphost hash #110554
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [browser] [wasm] Make response streaming opt-out #111680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112881
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.x
  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasmDiffable #113161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/9.0] [browser][http] mute JS exceptions about network errors + HEAD verb #113261
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0][browser][http] mute JS exceptions about network errors + HEAD verb #113271
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Optimize Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory #111050
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #112861
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • Perform additional checks in `PEHeaders`. #113048
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #113333
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #113328
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • TP diff check #112704
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
